**Be aware:** Changes in this version are minimal and it has mainly been released as an attempt at fixing the team switcher in time for Halloween. The map will receive a lot more updates, and potentially even a CS:GO port some time soon. If you have good ideas for improvements PLEASE message me either on here, or YouTube (which I check almost every day) http://www.youtube.com/SpyWhoLovedHimself I **WILL** take your suggestions very seriously. Those who have criticism, definitely message me with ways I can make it more enjoyable for you, I want to make this map fun for everyone.


Quick Message
=====================

Crazy to think I first released this map Halloween of 2009 (3 whole years ago) and have been further developing it on and off ever since! Thank you to those who have supported me and this map throughout! I know it's a bit like Marmite, some will love it, whilst some don't enjoy Hide & Seek (I am always trying to improve the gameplay to make it more fun for those players, hence the CT knife). But to everyone who has messaged me to tell me how much they love the map, thank you... That's what makes it all worth it to me! I take all suggestions very seriously, without user input it wouldn't be where it is now... Again, thanks.

- Starving Hobo

P.S. If you have a few friends with mic, try playing this map at night in a small private server. Alltalk on. I personally think it's the most fun played that way :)


Fright Night: Part 2 (Fix: V3)
=====================

About the map:

It functions as a hide and seek map with a few twists.  Counter-Terrorists spawn with no weapons and must hide and avoid being killed by the Terrorists who must hunt them down and kill them.  There is a three minute time limit, after which the Terrorists will be killed and swapped with Counter-Terrorists.  There is a maximum of three Terrorists who play as Leatherface, Jack Torrance and Freddy Krueger, each gets a special weapon apart from Freddy, but Freddy can play scary music by right clicking after a certain amount of time has passed.  It is set up to be like a horror movie with some areas being based on movie scenes, such as the kitchen (The Texas Chainsaw Massacre), bathroom (The Shining), tool shed (The Evil Dead), maze (The Shining) and the "bookshelf" door (horror clich√©).

There is a single knife which spawns in the tool shed after a random amount of time each round.  When a Counter-Terrorist picks it up he assumes the character of Ash (The Evil Dead) with matching quotes on right click.


Terrorists: 3
Counter-Terrorists: 29

Maximum of 32 players.


NO-BLOCK SERVER PLUGIN VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED FOR PLAYING THIS MAP

Map Story
=====================

It's 3 minutes to midnight on Halloween! A group of CTs have seeked refuge from the storm in an old haunted mansion. Just when everything seemed okay, a huge lightning bolt struck three graves outside of the mansion! Shocked, the CTs watched outside, as three killers rose from their graves wielding scary looking weapons! The CTs desperately searched for their own weapons but remembered that they had lost them a long way back! The murderers have just 3 minutes until Halloween ends and they must return to their graves for another year, but can the CTs survive for that long as they are chased and taunted in the dark scary mansion?!


Ghost Hunting Side Quest
=====================

There are 3 ghost sightings hidden in this map. The ghost is of the caretaker (you can find his hanging corpse in the tool shed basement). If you want a little ghost hunting fun see if you can find them all. One of the sightings is only enabled on certain rounds randomly (1/6 chance).

Trivia (A.K.A. sh*t nobody cares about)
=====================

- The map was originally going to be a spooky version of item battle until during play-testing, one of the players without a weapon commented that it was really scary being chased without any way to defend himself.
- The attic of the original map prior to release was the full length of the room and completely pitch black, terrorists would run around using radar to find any CTs hiding up there.
- Before the gameplay was changed from item battle, the crypt outside was going to be an entrance to a ghost train which would take players around the map and through the mansion.
- The TV works by using a series of doors, a logic_timer and a LOT of hard work syncing it with the original video (it used to have audio)... The title screen works the same way.
